import React, { useState } from 'react' import './FoodItem.css'; import { assets } from '../../assets/assets'; const FoodItem = ({id, name, price, description, image}) => { const [itemCount, seetItemCount] = useState(0); return (
{!itemCount ? seetItemCount(prev=>prev+1)} src={assets.add_icon_white} /> :
}

{name}

{description}

${price}

) } export default FoodItem
